short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Papyrify your life. Swaps website fonts to papyrus when activated.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you bored of Open Sans? Tired of 'designers' controlling your web experience? Perhaps you're just feeling a bit fantasy today? Papyrify is the answer.
